import { React, useState } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ fullname: '', username: '', email: '', pass: '', cpass: '' }) const [message, setMessage] = useState(' ') let keyname, valuename; const handleInputs = (e) => { console.log(user) keyname = e.target.name valuename = e.target.value setUser({ ...user, [keyname]: valuename }) } const postData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("Register CLicked") alert("Hi") const res = await fetch("/register", { method: 'POST', headers: { "content-type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ 'username': user.username, 'fullname': user.fullname, 'email': user.email, 'password': user.pass, 'cpassword': user.cpass }) }) const data = await res.json() if (res.status === 422 || !data) { setMessage(data.error) } else if (res.status === 201) { setMessage(data.message) } } return (

Sign Up

< div className="col">

{message}

I have an account
) } export default Register
